=======
History
=======

0.1.0 (2017-04-17)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.1.1 (2017-04-17)
------------------
* Switch to lookmlgen for module name

0.1.2 (2017-04-18)
------------------
* Move primary_key from Field to Dimension
* Remove stub for command line use
* Add docstrings

0.1.3 (2017-04-20)
------------------
* Default sql parameter of fields to ${TABLE}.field_name
